traits.name: Psychic Maelstrom
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the shark must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: The shark regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the shark takes radiant damage or suffers a critical hit, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The shark dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}.
